    • Constructor Detail

      • SubCommand

        public SubCommand(java.lang.String[] aliases,
                  Permissions permissions,
                  java.lang.String description,
                  java.lang.String usage)
        Create a sub command for a normal command Command
        Parameters:
        aliases - The aliases of the sub command (e.g [prefix][mainCommandAlias] [subCommandAlias] [args]
        permissions - The permissions of the command Permissions
        description - The description of the command (is needed for help message)
        usage - The usage of the command (is needed for help message)
